title: United Kingdom RICS House Price Balance
description: RICS House Price Balance in the United Kingdom decreased to -1.88 percent in October from 30.48 percent in September of 2022. RICS House Price Balance in the United Kingdom averaged 16.83 percent from 1978 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 100 percent in January of 1978 and a record low of -92.33 percent in April of 2008. The Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (RICS) House Price Balance measures the percentage of surveyors reporting a house price rise in their designated area, minus those reporting a fall. A level above 0% indicates more surveyors reported a rise in prices; below indicates more reported a fall. This page includes a chart with historical data for the United Kingdom RICS House Price Balance.
author: Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (RICS)
